song_lyrics: Ruḍho hi Yagnapuruṣho bhuvi tatvavṛukṣha-shchhando vasanta-tilakā tvarate sugāne ॥1॥
Prāyojayat sakala-buddhi-suchāturī swām brahmākṣharasya khalu ḍiṇḍimabhavyaghoṣhe ॥2॥
Kolāhalashcha kalahashcha kukarmadhātāh soḍhāh suhāsavadanen prasādabuddhyā ।
Te panycha sādhu-niyamā nanu panycha divyā brahmākṣharam tadadhipo Harikṛuṣhṇadevah ।
Vishve hyupāsanavidhehe suvikāsahetorānandabrahma satatam sahajo hi yogī ।
Naikātmanah parama-mokṣha-patham vinetum dīrghakṣhaṇen svadhiyā cha vichakṣhaṇo’yam ।
Utsāha-dhairya-karuṇā-rasa-sannipātam yogyāshiṣhā mam gurum pramukham chakār ॥9॥
title: Yagnapuruṣhastavah
